class: flex flex-col justify-between items-center overflow-y-auto z-40

content.class: p-2 self-stretch place-self-stretch text-center items-center z-40

item.class: text-sm open-sans font-semibold px-4 md:p-1 lg:px-4 py-1
item.color: dark:text-gray-200 dark:hover:text-red-500 hover:text-red-700 transition duration-700 ease-in-out
